sentences.sContent: Being in a state regarded as primitive, uncivilized, or unregenerate.
sentences.sContent_eng: Being in a state regarded as primitive, uncivilized, or unregenerate.
sentences.sCn: 未开化的不文明的人群中的人。

sentences.sContent: He no longer sins with his heart and will and whole inclination, as an unregenerate man does.
sentences.sContent_eng: He no longer sins with his heart and will and whole inclination, as an unregenerate man does.
sentences.sCn: 他的心志，意念和整个的爱好倾向不再 再 如没有新生命的人那样会犯罪。

synos.tran: 不悔改的；灵魂未得再生的；顽固不化的
